name: Web Content Editable HTML5

screenshots.caption: Web Content Editable Addon Firefox - Preview

short_description:
Edit the content of your web pages directly in your Firefox browser. Explore and inspects the Web document, the code html, css, scripts and the object model. Finally, the code generates the html page and download the changes instantaneously and directly to your computer with the handy download button included in the extension. If you'd like, use this extension in conjunction with this useful addons always dedicated to the famous Firefox browser: Firescreen - https://sourceforge.net/projects/firescreen/ and Try IT HTML5 editor - https://addons.mozilla.org/it/firefox/addon/try-it-html5-editor/?src=ss

==Installation==
1. Download add-on directly from your browser Firefox
2. Click on icon of extension in toolbar of browser and then click on center button to active content editable. If you have completed changes click on download icon to save web page or if you want inspect web page with button code inspector
summary: Edit the content of your web pages directly in your Firefox browser
